name: HereNextYear, LLC
description:
Marty Dickinson started his web services business in 1996, which was soon named Here Next Year after someone asked him, "We'd like to hire you , but how do we know you'll be around in six months?" What catapulted Here Next Year into sudden growth was when Marty started providing educational web marketing workshops in 2004 to accompany his first book, Winning the Internet Dogfight.
A few years later, he co-authored Web Marketing All-in-One for Dummies (Wiley) and his speaking and business expanded further. Today, Here Next Year is completely devoted to growing one's business through online presentation. The Tuesday morning club meeting is designed to provide a free practice forum for anyone interested improving his or her online presentation skills.
